participant_1.background:
I am a good swimmer and I enjoy teaching my children to swim.
I've been spending more time at the farmers market since I quit my job.
my family is poor.
I'm single and enjoy my freedom, but I'm open to meeting someone special.
my car is blue.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to share my love of reading and cooking with you.
I dress to impress, even when my heart is broken.
I went to the beach and relaxed.
I check my phone to see if there are any messages.
I am a mystery buff and live in London.

content.text: Hello, I am doing well. How are you doing?
I'm doing well. I just quit my job and I've been spending more time at the farmers market.
That's great! I love going to the farmers market. I'm always looking for new and interesting produce.
Me too! I've been trying to eat healthier since I quit my job.
That's great! I'm trying to do the same thing. I've been reading a lot about nutrition lately.
That's awesome! I love reading. I've been reading a lot of mystery novels lately.
I love mystery novels too! I just finished reading one by Agatha Christie.
Me too! I love her books. I've read them all.
She's one of my favorite authors. I'm always looking for new mystery novels to read.
Me too! I've been having a hard time finding any good ones lately.
I have a few suggestions if you're interested.
I just read a really good one by J.D. Robb. It's called "Naked in Death". It's the first book in a series.
That sounds great! I'll check it out.
It's a really good series. I've read all of them
